attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Net neutrality is the founding principal behind the internet, it means that each website has as much importance as each other allowing for no website to be received any different than any other.

Competition is at a maximum as no web site can claim dominance over another other than supplying a better or more popular service.

It has been said that a CEO of a major internet provider wishes to sell off Net Neutrality to profit from large companies wishing to be provided quicker than others, it is speculated that this would close many if not all small business's reliant on the internet for service, let alone remove our last true freedom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
